body:
No, I'm not retiring. I'm staying as staff till the end. This server has created so many memorable experiences, and has given me the chance to work and play with wonderful people I never would've been able to even talk to. As much as I hate it, Avicus' end was imminent, so there really wasn't much that can be done.
There are new servers on the rise, however, one of them being Zildith Network and the other being Pagoda Network. I believe that both of those servers are in good hands, and therefore the legacy of Avicus as well.

Well, it was my birthday, so I'll do one last AMA before the end. Ask away.

replies.body:
Happy Birthday, hope you had a great one :)!
Thanks, I did. Also had the "Squid" rank temporarily on discord so I'm thankful for that as well.
Opinions?
Miss you in the staff team, I remember the jokes of "Junr the Junior" when you were junior mod back then. You were also one of the only ones to wish me luck in game on my staff application, although back then I was a nobody and wasn't involved in the community at all Lol. All in all great person and staff, someone I wished was still on the team.

replies.body: Hard working senior, gotta say. You might have all those ranks but you seem to be able to balance the roles quite well. One of the more active senior mods, and map developer as well. Looking forward to finishing that map.
